definition: the use of certain marks to clarify meaning of written material by grouping words grammatically into sentences and clauses and phrases
details:
noun
- the use of certain marks to clarify meaning of written material by grouping words grammatically into sentences and clauses and phrases
- the marks used to clarify meaning by indicating separation of words into sentences and clauses and phrases
= synonyms: punctuation mark
- something that makes repeated and regular interruptions or divisions
